name: Rain, House, Eternity
description:
ascend an ancient structure and gather your thoughts as you make your way towards mortality

this game has two endings and two beginnings

CW: emotional abuse, suicide/suicidal ideation

WASD + mouse to move

left click / E to interact

shift to run

space to jump

H to hide cursor

Esc to quit

donations sincerely appreciated <3
